definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
stripes of a tiger/"tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
lit. a banquet with no empty seats/full house/capacity crowd/standing room only
to exist in name only/empty shell/useless (idiom)

sentences.english: Ischemic colitis commonly occurs in the elderly and has a wide clinical spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的虚血性大肠炎发生在老年人。

sentences.english: The Jordache garage was on the outskirts of town, so they got a lot of transient traffic.
sentences.chinese: 乔达虚汽车修理厂位于市郊，那里过往车辆很多。

sentences.english: IDB has the same three functions at the beginning of its vtable.
sentences.chinese: IDB在虚函数表的开始位置有3个同样的函数。

sentences.english: Now there is no moral to the story here.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，仁义道德都是虚的，能赚到钱才是真的。

sentences.english: Step Into Specific does not work with virtual functions.
sentences.chinese: “单步执行特定函数”不处理虚函数。

sentences.english: Satre s aesthetics of nothingness was included in his philosophy of nothingness.
sentences.chinese: 萨特早期哲学中内含的美学是一种虚无论美学。

sentences.english: The virtual functions simply write a line of text to standard output.
sentences.chinese: 虚函数简单地向标准输出写一行文本。

sentences.english: All characters in the book are imaginary.
sentences.chinese: 书中所有的人物都是虚的。

sentences.english: The CPU control unit transforms a linear address into a physical address automatically.
sentences.chinese: CPU会自动把一个虚地址映射成一个物理地址。

sentences.english: Don't always say the catchwords and slogans that are not real.
sentences.chinese: 虚的口号或标语不要常挂嘴上。

sentences.english: Ignorant people believe his ravings and lose their original resolve.
sentences.chinese: 彼无知者，信是虚诳，遗失本心。

sentences.english: Indus broken dreams, even if another beautiful, but also virtual.
sentences.chinese: 梧桐碎梦，纵然再美好，也是虚的。

sentences.english: Whoever takes the role of enemy and of attacker, still is this the truth.
sentences.chinese: 不论是谁在扮演敌人及攻击者的角色，此言不虚。

sentences.english: In comparison, the path of my son's education is really smooth, which is the actual benefit he receives from the cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 反观儿子的求学路，很是顺利，修行的利益真实不虚。

sentences.english: Bugfix on the display of the imaginary part for current-sources in Geometry edit.
sentences.chinese: 几何修正了在显示器上，目前来源的一部分虚编辑。

sentences.english: Zhuangzi holds that the secret of apprehending Tao is subtraction of life, namely "emptiness".
sentences.chinese: 庄子认为，悟道真正的奥秘在于“虚”。

definition: great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
demonic/iniquitous/nefarious/evil/unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine)/(coll.) strange/abnormal
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
deficiency of yin 陰|阴[yin1] in TCM
excess of internal heat due to poor general condition (TCM)/the prestige of another person, which one borrows for oneself
